ES.name: E-mini S&P 500 Futures
ES.description: Full-sized S&P 500 Futures. Quarterly expirations: March, June, September, December
ES.notes: CME Globex: Sunday 18:00 ET to Friday 17:00 ET. RTH: 09:30-16:00 ET Mon-Fri

MES.name: E-mini S&P 500 Micro Futures
MES.description: Micro-sized S&P 500 Futures. Quarterly expirations: March, June, September, December
MES.notes: CME Globex: Sunday 18:00 ET to Friday 17:00 ET. RTH: 09:30-16:00 ET Mon-Fri

VIX.name: Volatility Index Futures
VIX.description: CBOE Volatility Index Futures. Monthly expirations on the 30-calendar day
VIX.notes: Expires 30 calendar days before the third Friday of the following month
